meanings.definition: A cooperative association of workers in Russia.
meanings.sent1: The artel of farmers shared tools and resources to help each other.
meanings.sent2: The artel of artists collaborated on a mural for the community center.
meanings.sent3: The artel of bakers decided to bake a giant cake together for fun.
meanings.sent4: The artel of musicians harmonized beautifully during the concert.
meanings.sent5: The artel of fishermen caught so many fish that they had a feast.

meanings.definition: A group of people working together in a cooperative manner.
meanings.sent1: The neighborhood artel organized a clean-up day for the park.
meanings.sent2: The artel of students studied together for the exam.
meanings.sent3: The artel of friends planned a surprise party for their teacher.
meanings.sent4: The artel of volunteers painted the community center with bright colors.
meanings.sent5: The artel of athletes trained hard to win the championship.
